mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (select BOARD_TYPE_NO, LEVEL BOARDLEVEL, BOARD_NO, BOARD_GROUP_NO, CASE WHEN LEVEL = 1 THEN '' ELSE LPAD('→ ', LEVEL*2, '―') END || CASE WHEN BOARD_DEL_CHECK = '1' THEN '**삭제된 게시글입니다**' ELSE BOARD_TITLE END BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, BOARD_DEL_CHECK, BOARD_DATE FROM(select * from board where BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{board_type_no}) START WITH BOARD_GROUP_NO is null CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_NO = BOARD_GROUP_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_NO) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM board where board_type_no = #{board_type_no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_title}, sysdate, #{board_del_check}, #{user_id}, null, #{board_type_no}, #{board_content})
mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content} where board_no = #{board_no}
update board set board_del_check = 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
